## AreaCopyrightInfo interface

Schema of \[Map Tile API copyright endpoint\](https://developer.here.com/documentation/map-tile/topics/resource-copyright.html) JSON response.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AreaCopyrightInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [alt](./harp-mapview.areacopyrightinfo.alt.md) | string | Verbose copyright text of the label to display by mouse over label or info menu entry. |
|  [boxes](./harp-mapview.areacopyrightinfo.boxes.md) | Array&lt;\[number, number, number, number\]&gt; | The bounding boxes define areas where specific copyrights are valid. A bounding box is defined by bottom (latitude), left (longitude) and top (latitude), right (longitude).<!-- -->The default copyright has no boxes element and covers all other areas. |
|  [label](./harp-mapview.areacopyrightinfo.label.md) | string | Copyright text to display after the copyright symbol on the map. |
|  [maxLevel](./harp-mapview.areacopyrightinfo.maxlevel.md) | number | Maximum zoom level for the specified copyright label. |
|  [minLevel](./harp-mapview.areacopyrightinfo.minlevel.md) | number | Minimum zoom level for the specified copyright label. |
